roleset.name: to ignite anew

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result , he reignited the inflation that Mrs. Thatcher , through a long and costly effort , had subdued [*T*] .
example.arg: the inflation that Mrs. Thatcher , through a long and costly effort , had subdued

roleset.note: REIGNITE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reignite' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reignite.01-v predicate notes)
